item.title: Github Blog setup
item.description: Introduction Blogs are probably a good way to show case the bioinformatic learning journey. A free blog can be created using github and Hugo themes. Following instructions were provided for a Mac. GitHub Setup If not already, create a github account. Make two repositories in your account. 1 Your github account name followed by github.io. This folder visibility is set to public. 2 Generic blog repository. Used to store all the code needed.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello World My name is Kesava Asam, a wet lab trained scientist that got into dry lab in 2019. I would like to catalogue my journey into Bioinformatics in this blog post. I will post different bioinformatic pipelines that worked for our lab. Ettiquette that helped us to gain reproducible results. Some tips and tricks that I follow on a day to day basis. Operating System I mostly work on a linux system or a Mac.
